title: Did Voters Wear Pearls on Election Day To Honor Kamala Harris?
subtitle: #PearlsForKamala and #PearlsToThePolls were popular Twitter hashtags on Election Day 2020.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: In the days leading up to the 2020 general election, social media users encouraged one another to wear pearls in honor of Democratic vice-presidential candidate Kamala Harris, not the late Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg.
